attributes.title: Horrible
attributes.review: I opened this app and the first thing I saw was a cheeto puff. This app is very offensive to poc and I don’t know why it still exists. This app should be deleted off the app store asap.

attributes.title: Can’t believe this app exists!
attributes.review: I wish I could have given this app zero stars, but it wasn’t allowed:(. This app is full of fake news.

attributes.title: The Declaration of Independence
attributes.review: Opened this app with tears they took my baby broke my ankles told my granny she had no knees and tried to feed a peanut butter sandwich burnt how you gonna burn a sandwich any who my lawyer will be in contact 💅🏽

attributes.title: This app is horrible 🍆💦🍑
attributes.review: I open this app because my friends are trump supporters and all I see is a naked orange. Who in the hell put the muffins in the freezer. Also there was this one guy who was spray painted orange like kiss me sexy. 🍊

attributes.title: worst app in store
attributes.review: This man really just made an app and all that we can view is a white house closet tour....???? like fr he has a tanning station and everything. What was the point???

attributes.title: turned to democratic because of this!!!!
attributes.review: was walking my horse when i opened the app to see trump’s likable face when my horse’s balls had suddenly fallen out!!! no other explanation for this. VOTING BLUE.

attributes.title: WORST APP EVER
attributes.review: This app is so slow and I’m not even sure what the purpose of it is. There’s also soo many pictures of a disgusting CHEETO looking mf. It’s a hard pass for me on this one guys. No thank you

attributes.title: FIRST OFF
attributes.review: First off I when I open up the app my phone freezes on a photo of the president of the United States naked and spray tanning please please don’t get this app if you want to be horrified

attributes.title: Terrifying
attributes.review: This app tried to kill my family. First it went to my grandmothers house and drop kicked her! Then the real cheeto man came and tried to eat my baby! I fear for my life.

attributes.title: Horrendous Beyond Belief!
attributes.review: I originally purchased this app with the intention of broadening my political horizons and developing some love for the president. However as soon as I opened the app, mr. DT himself popped up yelling all sorts of racist things at me 😭 never again 👁👅👁
